Question.Subject: What is a 'Tumblr Crush'?
Question.Content: Pretty much what the question asks. I have a Tumblr account, but I often hear people saying stuff about having a 'Tumblr Crush'. I have no idea what that is, can anyone explain what it is and how I can find it out or whatev? Thank you :)
Question.ChosenAnswer:
in tumblr you have the option to live a photo (the little heart) A tumblr crush is the person whose photos you've like the most.
Follow me! http://smokingfish.tumblr.com/

Answer.Content:
in tumblr you have the option to live a photo (the little heart) A tumblr crush is the person whose photos you've like the most.
